page.title: 10Television programmes
page.content: At our school we did a survey of favourite programmes.We found that "Street Hawk" was the most popular.It is an American programme about a man who rides a motorbike and catches crooks.The next most popular was "Blue Peter" which tells you about things you do not know.The presenters show you how to cook things such as barbecue food and how to make things such as a doll's house or Christmas cards;they also look at things like a meteorite or miniature Shetland pony."Biskits" was equally popular with "Blue Peter".It is a cartoon about puppies protecting kings' treasure. Other programmes mentioned were "Playschool","Knight Rider","Magnum", "Dogtanian and the 3 Muskehounds","The A team","Benny Hill","Riptide","Fraggle Rock","Fame","Hunter","Watch",and "Fall Guy".
